title: Dr Jekyll And Mr. Hyde (with Original Soundtrack)

sources.title: Dr Jekyll And Mr. Hyde (with Original Soundtrack)
sources.description: 1920 directed by John S. Robertston starring John Barrymore, Martha Mansfield, Brandon Hurst, Charles Lane, Cecil Clovelly, Nita Naldi and Louis Wolheim. Tragedy results when the goodly Dr. Jekyll begins experimenting with the seedier side of human nature. Soundtrack is composed of several partial pieces by Bull of Heaven: "She is as the Nights are Horrible pt. 1", "A Ghost Prehistoric pt. 2", "I Watched you Enter Your Home from Within a Dumpster" and "From the Threshing Floor? From the Winepress?"
